mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(NOTICE_ID, 3, LENGTH(NOTICE_ID)-2) AS NOTICE_ID, S_CODE_NM , TITLE , CONTENTS , USER_ID , NVL(TO_CHAR(UP_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')) REG_DT , UP_DT , TOP_YN , SHOW_YN , VIEWS , REG_NM FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_ID LIKE #{ntcType} || '%' AND SHOW_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(NOTICE_ID) DESC

SELECT NOTICE_ID, S_CODE_NM, TITLE, CONTENTS, USER_ID, NVL(TO_CHAR(UP_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')) REG_DT , UP_DT, TOP_YN, SHOW_YN, VIEWS, REG_NM FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE SHOW_YN = 'Y' AND S_CODE_NM = #{noticeGb} AND SUBSTR(NOTICE_ID, 3) = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE ( NOTICE_ID, S_CODE_NM, TITLE, CONTENTS,
REG_DT, TOP_YN, SHOW_YN, VIEWS, REG_NM ) VALUES ( #{noticeCd} || (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NOTICE_ID, 3))) + 1, 1) NOTICE_ID FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_ID LIKE #{noticeCd} || '%' ), #{sCodeNm}, #{title}, #{contents},
SYSDATE, 'N', 'Y', 0, #{regNm} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET VIEWS = VIEWS + 1 WHERE SUBSTR(NOTICE_ID, 3) = #{noticeId} AND S_CODE_NM = #{noticeGb}
